content.description:
The data table below shows plant biodiversity of different ecosystems in Glacier National Park. In parts of the park, the glacier is receding leading to succession.

Number of Different Species in Four Glacier National Park Ecosystems

Ecosystem
 Mosses and lichens
 Grasses
 Shrubs
 Trees

Ecosystem A
 7
 6
 5
 5

Ecosystem B
 15
 8
 0

Ecosystem C
 3

 16

Ecosystem D
 3
 5
 9
 9
content.question: Based on the data in the table, which ecosystem is in the earliest stages of succession?

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe patterns or trends in data.
